messages:
Name: Yunus Akgün
Nationality: Türkiye
Date of Birth: July 7, 2000
Position: Attacker
Current club: Leicester City
Championship clubs played for: Leicester City

Yunus Akgün is a Leicester City attacker who has played in the majority of their Championship matches in 2023/2024, making 23 appearances overall and accumulating 886 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in nine of these appearances across their 46 fixtures and been mainly used off the bench on 14 occasions.

Akgün last appeared in a league game on May 4, playing 28 minutes for Leicester City against Blackburn Rovers in a 2-0 defeat. In total, he has scored one Championship goal in 2023/2024, and registered two assists. He has been booked once.
He opened his account for the campaign against Swansea City on January 30, scoring during a 3-1 victory.
In last season's Süper Lig, Akgün played in 25 games for Galatasaray, scored one goal and provided two assists.
Akgün switched to Leicester City on loan in August 2023 from Galatasaray, for whom he has made 42 league appearances in total, scoring two goals and providing three assists.
